text: SM Station is a digital music project by South Korean record label SM Entertainment. It undertook to release one digital single every Friday starting from February 3, 2016. ==Compilation album== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:12em;" | Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:16em;"| Album details !
